name: Short Circuit (itch) (pachoncito)
description:
Controls:

  • Left player movement : WASD.
  • Right player movement:  Arrow keys.

You control  two players ( or you can play it with a friend). When the players are close enough an electric  arc  start between them, Move the characters around and get points be destroing the enemies with that arc.  but if you left that connection for too long it can stunt both of the players, so be careful.

(the images and gif are from the last build i made, but the build finish compressing after the jam close the submissions, so the font is not there).

This is my first game, hope you like it.
